es.uc3m.baldo.opinais.ir.preprocessors

Class StopWordsRemover

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uc3m.baldo.opinais.ir.preprocessors.StopWordsRemover
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PreProcessor<java.lang.String>

    public class StopWordsRemover
extends java.lang.Object
implements PreProcessor<java.lang.String>
    StopWordsRemover.

    Removes words from an input string if those are contained in a stop-words set.

    This processor is useful when analyzing texts, as many words (e.g. determinants and prepositions) are meaningless.

    Author:
    Alejandro Baldominos
